definition: A sudden and forceful downward movement or fall, often resulting in injury or damage. It is commonly used to describe accidents or incidents involving a person or object falling or tumbling abruptly.

examples.german: Der Sturz vom Fahrrad war schmerzhaft.
examples.english: The fall from the bike was painful.

examples.german: Er erlitt einen schweren Sturz beim Skifahren.
examples.english: He had a serious fall while skiing.

examples.german: Der Sturz des Diktators f체hrte zu politischen Ver채nderungen.
examples.english: The fall of the dictator led to political changes.

examples.german: Sie trug eine Gehirnersch체tterung nach dem Sturz.
examples.english: She suffered a concussion after the fall.

examples.german: Der Sturz des Aktienkurses verursachte finanzielle Verluste.
examples.english: The fall of the stock price caused financial losses.
